pageProduct.name: OptiSlim Life Shake Banana 50g Sachet
pageProduct.description:
General Information

The Optislim LCD (low calorie diet) Life shakes are a delicious formulated meal replacement that contain 25 vitamins and minerals and uses only natural colours and flavours. Replace 2 meals per day in conjunction with a low calorie/kilojoule meal to achieve weight loss. Remember to maintain adequate fluid intake.  We recommend that a minimum of 2 litres of water is consumed per day

Warnings

This product should not be used by pregnant, nursing and lactating women or by infants, children and adolescents, except when medically indicated.

Ingredients

Milk Solids, Wheat Protein [contains Gluten], Fructose, Sugar, Milk Protein [contains Soy Lecithin], Dipotassium Phosphate, Natural Banana Flavour (1%), Sunflower Oil [contains Emulsifier (472c), Antioxidants (304, 306, 322, 472c)], Sodium Tripolyphosphate, Banana Powder (1%), Maltodextrin, Salt, Magnesium Oxide, Calcium Carbonate, Vitamin C, Natural Colours (150a, 100), Ferrous Fumarate, Zinc Sulphate Monohydrate, Sweetener (955), Vitamin E, Nicotinamide, Calcium Panthothenate, Vitamin A, Manganese Sulphate, Copper Sulphate, Selenium Methionine, Vitamin B12, Riboflavin, Vitamin B6, Thiamine, Folic Acid, Sodium Molybdate, Chromium Chloride, Potassium Iodide, Biotin, Vitamin D3. CONTAINS MILK AND MILK PRODUCTS, GLUTEN, SOYBEANS AND THEIR PRODUCTS.

Directions

In a shaker, add one 50g sachet to 200ml of chilled water and shake to dissolve. Drink immediately. Once prepared any unused portions should be discarded, it should not be stored for use at a later time. One serve of the Optislim Life shake can be replaced with one serve of any other product in the Life range.

To achieve a healthy weight it is important you live a healthy lifestyle. Whilst various products may be of assistance in achieving your weight loss aims, eating a healthy energy-controlled diet and ensuring you engage in sufficient and appropriate physical activity will help you on your journey to a healthier you.
